title: @GeorgeHWBush, Twitter's newest user: This week's Silicon Tally
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Craig Rowin, host of It's That Episode podcast and  a writer for Comedy Central's new internet-themed game show "@midnight" talks tech and takes the test.

Play along at home, below.
description: 12,000 people, 30 percent and 48 hours. What do these numbers mean? Take the quiz and find out!
teaser: 12,000 people, 30 percent and 48 hours. What do these numbers mean? Take the quiz and find out!
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 13, 2013
